name: obsidian-vault-assistant
description: Obsidian Desktop plugin integrating NotebookLM via notebooklm-mcp-cli

scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p "/Users/jaewone/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/JaewonE/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-vault-assistant" && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css "/Users/jaewone/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/JaewonE/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-vault-assistant/" && rm -f "/Users/jaewone/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/JaewonE/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-vault-assistant/data.json"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
